title: GoldV top main looking for group to climb to Plat
body:
Hey guys looking for 4 other chilled players who are GV or higher to climb to plat with. I'm easy to get along with, won't rage, and i'll only ever blame the jungler if something goes wrong, because we all know it's always the junglers fault :D

feel free to add me, I play quite often and i'm looking forward to getting plat!

Also would be handy if you had curse voice or discord :D cheers
